I have played this for a while now.  Im in love with DangerZone, but this game is so infiltrated with cheaters/hackers i would NEVER recommend anyone playing it.  I actually tell people to stay away.  Although you can report cheaters, the time frame for action by CS admins is so slow....so there is no point.  The cheating is rampant on all aspects of the game.  Im writing this right after a series of matches in DZ and other games and EVERY match had some hacker....Just stay away, this game is trash for those who like honest gaming!!!!!!!!  I really want my operation money and prime money back.
